column4: hi, just put xubuntu 10 on a IBM X31 and wanna know if the wifi card could be easily configured?
wifi cards are not identified by their box name. you need to provide outputs of lspci, lsusb, lshw -c | grep Network to pastebin
give output of : lspci -nn | grep Network
that number combo at the end there is how you wifi card is indentified.
